subject: URGENT: Action required immediately
body:
Hi,

This is an urgent matter that requires your immediate attention. Please respond as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Support Team

subject: Question about your recent order
body:
Hello,

I have a question regarding your recent order #12345. Could you please clarify the delivery address?

Thanks,
Customer Service

subject: Weekly Newsletter - Latest Updates
body:
Hi there,

Here's your weekly newsletter with the latest updates and news from our team.

Best regards,
Newsletter Team

subject: URGENT: Action required immediately

subject: Password reset request
body:
Good morning,

We need your input on the upcoming budget planning session. Your expertise would be valuable.

Regards,
David Brown

subject: ASAP: Server maintenance
body:
Hello,

The quarterly results are in and they look promising. I've attached the detailed report for your review.

Thanks,
Sarah Smith

subject: Job application status
body:
Dear team,

The new software update is ready for testing. Please let me know if you encounter any issues.

Sincerely,
James Lee

subject: Monthly newsletter
body:
Good morning,

The monthly metrics are now available. I've highlighted the key performance indicators in the report.

Regards,
Sarah Smith
